block_comment: This block of Verilog code configures parameters for the Audio_Out_Left_Channel_FIFO module. It sets the data width, data depth, and address width to specific values. The parameter 'DATA_WIDTH' is set to AUDIO_DATA_WIDTH, defining the bit-width of the data processed by the FIFO. The parameter 'DATA_DEPTH' is configured as 128, specifying the total amount of data that the FIFO can hold. The 'ADDR_WIDTH' parameter is set to 7, establishing the size of the memory address space for the FIFO. These parameters are crucial in specifying the capacity and data handling characteristics of the FIFO.
